description: This Java source file defines the class MockLegacyKeypad, which extends MockLegacySecurityDevice and implements MockPeripheral and MockSecurityController. It serves as a mock implementation of a legacy keypad device in the system, including initialization of device parameters, cluster setup, and a method to request panel state changes.

classes.name: MockLegacyKeypad
classes.description: A mock class representing a legacy keypad device in the security system simulation.

methods.name: MockLegacyKeypad
methods.description: Constructor initializing the MockLegacyKeypad with name and optional EUI64, setting device parameters and creating associated clusters and endpoints.

methods.name: requestPanelStateChange
methods.description: Method to request a change in the panel's state by passing an access code and a specific keypad button action.
